import { useState } from 'react' import './Form.css'; const Form = (props) => { const [checked, setChecked] = useState({ "Action": false, "Racing / Driving": false, }) const test = () => { Object.keys(checked).forEach((key) => console.log(key, checked[key])) } const toggleChecked = (genre) => { setChecked({...checked, [genre]: !checked[genre]}) } return (
Welcome to GameREC!
) } export default Form;
